Reviews.Content: stayed total 5 days nh la clean hotel comfy lack drawers cupboards located outskirts barcelona takes ten minute stroll subway half hour las ramblas red line morning liked theres shopping mall hotel caters apparel food entertainment fortunately price stay trigger choose nh la unfortunately friendliness service wasnt worth neither 3 nor hostel ranking broken flush restroom wasnt appropriately fixed twice day left town announcing evening solved reception exactly plumber staff fixed day fixed wasnt arguing departure eg free breakfast functioning restroom basic necessity free drink hotel bar late checkout half hour discussion notice staff duty offended didnt seriously werent regular customers motto cust err employee advice dont breakfast overpriced instead shopping center dont necessarily hotel parking park street free 1h wlan codes reception front view concrete walls exit ramps
